entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing this morning. Amount 10 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 near noon. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
